title: Influence Points Changing
body:
Hello,
I'm sure if this is a bug but for some time now my influence points have been going up and down after and before a game or when I am logging it. I'm using the new client and its not a very big IP change but it would be nice to figure out why it does this. Does anyone else have this issue?
These are some picture of when I am logging in, I'll try to get some before and after a game too.

http://grabilla.com/0740c-0e870d1a-dcec-4ac0-a700-fab1307ea3ef.png  
http://grabilla.com/0740c-e127f86f-b4f0-4667-a985-7c306c7994b6.png

yeah having same problem

This may be a syncing issue with the updated client grabbing your most up to date balance.  If relogging doesn't fix this right away, see if hopping back to legacy client can force it through.  Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can help individually too.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Relogging doesn't fix it. I logged in using the legacy client (it shows I have 6648 IP) and then logged in to the new client but it still shows 6181 IP. I think I'll write a support ticket, thanks for the help!
